original_title: Kim Kanonarm og Rejsen mod Verdensrekorden
overview: Cannon Arm and the Arcade Quest is a deadly serious comedy, set in the world of arcade games and world records. It tells the story about the friendship between a group of unlikely heroes and peculiar world class gamers, who - on a backdrop of loss and longing - has set out to do what no one has ever done before: play the arcade game Gyruss non stop for 100 hours.
title: Cannon Arm and the Arcade Quest
